name: Develop A Predictive Model Using Snowflake And Sigma
content: Developing a predictive model strategy is critical in the ever-evolving landscape of data analytics and decision-making. In this hands-on lab, see how Snowflake and Sigma can help you easily create predictive models tailored to your business needs, forecast future trends, optimize operations, and make data-driven decisions. In this instructor-led session, you will learn how to: - Explore data, identify critical columns, and uncover insights without performing extensive coding. - Reduce complexity for a unified programming environment; develop and execute data pipelines, feature engineering, and machine learning models in a single place. - Eliminate the need for your end-users to possess in-depth data science expertise, making the process more accessible and efficient. Date and time: On Wed, 24 Jul 2024 10:00 - Wed, 24 Jul 2024 11:00 Venue details: Online
